chapters.title: Chapter 23:  Call to a Sitting
chapters.info:
Merise Haindehl,
      p. 494â€”Aes
      Sedai of the Green Ajah from Tarabon.  She has dark hair and very blue
      eyes.  She has three Warders, including
      Jahar Narishma, one of the Asha'man.
      See also
      Narishma, Jahar.
